## SDQ vs GAF

Software When aiming to analyze and understand the behavioural patterns and functionality of individuals, psychologists commonly use tools such as the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) and the Global Assessment of Function (GAF). With the advent of new AI technology, comparing SDQ vs GAF is now simpler and more accurate using Harmony's innovative software. Harmony revolutionizes the way psychologists and researchers compare different assessment instruments such as SDQ vs GAF. Offering intuitive use of natural language processing and generative AI models, Harmony provides a precise percentage match between each item in SDQ and GAF. Crystalizing the comparison, this tool addresses the need for rigorous, repeatable analysis across these crucial psychological instruments. With the SDQ vs GAF analysis that Harmony presents, researchers are equipped to make even parallel assessments across different studies and languages. A much-needed relief from the laborious process of harmonisation, Harmony is poised to become a key asset for clinicians, researchers, and educators in psychology. Visit [Harmony](https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app) and revolutionize your research process. ---

## Compare the items in SDQ and GAF

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and GAF into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAF into Harmony</a> - compare GAF with other instruments
